job_history.work_description: Responsible for Accounting & Finance functions including management of IT outsourcing vendor for $20 million government entity. Moved IT function to outsourced vendor vs. full-time employee, saving $34,000 in salary plus benefits and pension costs. Developed monthly financial reporting to all department heads & elected officials, budgeting processing, account reconciliations. Compile audit workpapers and manage audit process with external audit firm.

Developed standard monthly financial reporting, budgeting and forecasting processes, account reconciliations. Compiled and coordinated tax return with external CPA. Implemented processes and procedures for numerous activities including, but not limited to, Travel & Expense Policy, Credit & Collection Policy, Sales Order Process, Warranty & Customer Concessions Policy.

Reorganized accounting department to meet the needs of dramatically increasing company, including four acquisitions in one year. Led and directed 14 member team including all accounting functions, state and federal tax returns, sales tax for 49 states, monthly financial statements for venture capitalist owners and bank reporting as required by debt covenants.

Manage team of 30 professional and clerical level accounting team members to meet corporate, SEC and IRS reporting requirements. Progressive responsibility from $400 million System Products and seven employees to responsibility of $3.5 billion Controls Division and 30 employees.

Reduced Divisional Intercompany imbalance from over $1 Million per month to less than $10,000 within 12 months. Developed Sarbanes-Oxley audit processes for General Accounting and Financial Reporting one year in advance of implementation deadline.

skills.name: Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 20 years of experience in accounting, including roles as Finance Director, Director of Finance & Human Resources, Controller, and Accounting Manager, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with account reconciliations, including development of monthly financial reporting and management of audit process with external audit firm, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Developed and managed budgeting processes, including budgeting and forecasting, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led and directed large teams, including a 14-member team as Controller and a 30-member team as Accounting Manager, indicating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Developed and managed financial reporting processes, including monthly financial reporting and audit workpapers, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Audit Management
skills.explanation: Managed audit process with external audit firm and developed Sarbanes-Oxley audit processes, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Implemented processes and procedures for numerous activities, including Travel & Expense Policy, Credit & Collection Policy, and Sales Order Process, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Analyzed financial data and made recommendations for cost savings, including saving $34,000 in salary and benefits by outsourcing IT function, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for financial reporting and analysis, suggesting strong proficiency.
